email_body: Bill, Here is the information outstanding from our conversation yesterday: 1. Assessed value for the Leander land - $632,000 2. Mortgage on residence - Cendant Mortgage, Loan # 2328912 3. EIN for Bishops Corner, L.P. - 76 068 5666 4. I will fax you statements from various accounts Let me know what else I can do to be ready to turn around the invitation letter. I am pulling together all the organizational documents for the partnership. Phillip
